data.name: Cold Harvest
data.detailed_description:
A few weeks before Christmas, Robert (NEET)*, the main character, finds a flyer under the door with a job offer. For this work, as it turns out, the company pays good money. Facing financial difficulties, Robert overcomes his fears and goes out to be interviewed. Passing through the park, he meets a girl who awakens in him what he has been hiding from for the last three years (an uncontrolled erection). Despite the difficulties on his way, Robert manages to get a job as a courier. Completing the first order, he discovers a 100% way of how to seduce any girls and soon completely surrenders to lust. For a while, everything goes well, until one morning, he discovers horns on his head.


The Cold Harvest is a visual novel, an adventure, a dating simulator, and a world open to exploration. Visually, the game looks like an interactive comic (black and white manga) with colored elements and chapters.

• free movement
• interaction with characters and objects
• day and night mode
• transferring objects between locations
• puzzles and riddles
• dynamically developing plot
• mini games
• romantic relationships with lots of girls
• horror and action scenes
• Christmas atmosphere

You can play as different minor characters. Their storylines run parallel to the main story. This will allow you to get to know them better, and in some cases, save their lives. You will often have to choose which of the minor characters will survive and reach the final. The game has several endings. Therefore, you will be able to play it several times differently.

* NEET, an acronym for "Not in Education, Employment, or Training", refers to a person who is unemployed and not receiving an education or vocational training.

data.short_description: Make an incredible Christmas journey, from which you will not be able to tear yourself away until the very end. Playing the game, you will find your holiday spirit too.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some laptop users may need to manually enable their discrete GPU to run Cold Harvest.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages. It's better not to play this game at work. Nudity or scenes of a sexual nature
